actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to further cultural activities by making unused railroad passenger depots available to communities for such activities.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Amends the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act to direct the Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts to institute a program to acquire and make available to communities for cultural activities unused and underused railroad passenger depots. Directs the Chairman to establish an advisory council for consultation with respect to carrying out this Act. Authorizes the appropriation of $1,000,000 for fiscal year 1972, and such sums as may be necessary for each succeeding fiscal year, for purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to further cultural activities by making unused railroad passenger depots available to communities for such activities.
